title: Deny a Claim for a Non-Covered Peril
description: A homeowner files a claim for damage caused by a flood, but their policy does not include flood coverage.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and review their active coverages.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster confirms the homeowner's policy explicitly excludes flood damage.

tasks.description: Document the reason for the denial in the claim file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster logs 'No Coverage for Peril' as the denial reason.

tasks.description: Send a formal denial letter to the customer, clearly explaining that flood is an excluded peril and providing information on the National Flood Insurance Program.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster sends a clear, empathetic denial letter with helpful information.
